{{DISPLAYTITLE:List of minor ''Emmerdale'' characters (1994)}} {{Emmerdaleminor}} The following is a '''list of minor characters''' that first appeared in the [[United Kingdom|British]] [[soap opera]] '''''[[Emmerdale]]''''' in 1994, by order of first appearance. ==Reg Dawson== {{Infobox soap character 2 |series=Emmerdale |color=#99CCCC |image1= |name=Reg Dawson |portrayer=[[Niven Boyd]] |years=1994 |first=24 May 1994 |last=7 June 1994 |born= |death=7 June 1994 |wife=[[Viv Hope|Viv Dawson]] (1978â83) |sons=[[Scott Windsor]] |granddaughters=[[Jean Tate]] }} '''Reg Dawson''' is the former husband of [[Viv Hope]] and father of [[Scott Windsor]]. He first appeared on 24 May 1994. Reg, who abandoned Scott and Viv early in Scott's life, arrives in Emmerdale when he starts a siege on Home Farm. He kills one of his henchmen and [[Shirley Turner (Emmerdale)|Shirley Turner]], who died after receiving a bullet intended for Viv. Reg is shot dead by police marksmen. In his will, he leaves Viv several thousand pounds, but a stipulation said she had to leave her current husband, [[Vic Windsor]], to receive the money. She declines and stays with Vic.

[[Genesis Walker]] }} '''Benedict Alan "Ben" Dingle ''' is the son of [[Zak Dingle]]. He appeared in 1994. Ben is the first member of the [[Dingle family]] to appear in ''Emmerdale''. During a fight with [[Luke McAllister]] he dies of a heart defect. It originally appears as if Luke had murdered him, and the Dingles continue to blame him even after the truth comes out.
